body:
This rank gets;
-ability to join full teams
-pick your team
-silver "iron" prefix
-10 to 15 USD (to be decided)
-or it could be a voting reward!
elimination upgrades
-1 premium kit

walls upgrades
-1 premium kit

nexus upgrades
-1 premium kit

CTH
-1 premium kit

title: [RANK] iron.          Voting reward?

replies.body:
Compared to gold this gets not xp boost so it would not have a star next to name on the leaderboards.
who this rank is for;
-someone without much money to be able to donate to the server
-it's a great starter rank for a new player.
-for someone who wants a rank but wants 100% legit experience so they can join the same team as friends or other rank additions. (Pardon my spelling I wrote this on a mobile device)

its a reward for voting so avicus gets more popular.
anyway if it's not a voting reward and every1 buys it then it's good for the server. Say 500 people bought a 15$ rank it would be benefitial to avicus because only 200 of them would buy gold instead also it's for the top 3 voters in the month or something like that not for everyone who votes.

replies.body:
How bout this:
Perks:
Full teams
Pick teams
Grey "Iron" prefix

You would get this rank by donating every day for 27 days (an entire month -3 or 4 days incase you're on holiday). Once you vote 27 days in that month I'll get this rank for 1 month.

However, I cannot get this rank again for another month AFTER it expires.
Once it expires, you'll get a "Supporter" rank.

Support rank perks:
Nothing but a grey "Supporter tag" and access to donor channels on TS

replies.body:
This is not why I'm doing it.
im doing it to help increase avicus player base by ranking it higher on the voting menu or by helping the server earn money with a new rank. Currently I do vote but I type in random names because I don't want the exp.the donor rank for voting wasn't my idea either it was ebirdy9's who is already emerald so this rank wasn't designed to being it me it was for the community.

That's a k3wl idea,
what I understand from it is
you get a one month subscription to "iron" which then expires so you get a "support rank" possible rename to "iron ore" which lasts 4 1 month. Next month you can continue voting for "iron" like smelting keeping the naming theme.
